title: Detox My Fashion - Greenpeace International
description: Global fast fashion brands are churning out more clothes than the planet can handle.
cleaned_text: the path to toxic-free fashion? Global fast fashion brands are churning out more clothes than the planet can handle. Today's trends are tomorrow's trash, with our clothes made cheaply and disposed of quickly. It's time to redress the balance, challenge the throwaway mentality and invest in quality over quantity.
